Users:
        Sponsor//merge with organizer
        *Contestant
        *Organizer
        *Judges

User Stories:

    1)  As a contestant I want to access the application so that I can participate in a contest
    *2)  As a contestant I want to register so that I can participate in a contest
        ⁃   rule: certain fields are required
        ⁃   fields:
            ⁃   name
            ⁃   phone
            ⁃   email
            ⁃   address
            ⁃   general 
    3)  As a contestant I want to login so that I can participate in a contest
    4)  As a contestant I want to log out to ensure secure use
    5)  As a contestant I want to change my information so that it is always up to date
    6)  As a contestant I want to view my current entires so that I can verify my entries
    7)  As a contestant I want to submit an entry into a category so that I can participate in a contest
        ⁃   rule: 1 per category
        ⁃   rule: no more than 3
        ⁃   rule: can't submit after cutoff date
        ⁃   rule: certain fields are required
    8) As a contestant, I want to withdraw my entry so that I can act as a judge in a category.
    9)  As a judge I want to view categories that I am judging so that I can easily see only relevant entries
    10)  As a judge I want to view entries for a category so that I can compare 
    11) As a judge I want to submit an entry to a category so that I can participate in a contest
        ⁃   rule: cannot be a category for which i am judging
    12)  As a judge I want to accept or decline a request to be a judge so that I can participate as a judge or not.
        ⁃   rule: my entries for a category will be removed if I am to judge that category
    13) As a judge, I want to withdraw my entry to be allowed to judge that category.
    14) As an organizer I want to see the list of contestants so that I can verify contestants 
    15) As an organizer I want to create a contest so that contestants can participate
        ⁃   rule: certain fields are required
    16) As an organizer I want to remove a contest so that contestants cannot participate in a contest
    17) As an organizer I want to specify a user as a judge so that the user can judge entries
    18) As an organizer I want to send an email to all contestants to notify contestants of relevant information
    19) As an organizer I want to remove a contestant so that the list of eligible contestants is accurate
    20) As an organizer I want to unspecify a user as a judge so that the user is no longer able to judge entries
    21) As an organizer I want to be able to enter different contestant numbers, so I can accommodate small and large events.
    22) As an organizer I want to be able to limit the number of contestant entries, so we have at most three entries per contestant.
    23) As an organizer I want to be able to allow contestants to register and submit an entry at the same time.
    24) As a sponsor, I want to register so I can see the designs of contestants.
    25) As a sponsor I want to be able to have access to the list of guild members so I can choose judges.
    26) As a sponsor I want to have each entry include the type of pattern of the woven material so I can categorize them.
    27) As a sponsor I want to be able to define multiple criteria so I can segment entries.
